admissions.title: Application Form
admissions.description: Complete all sections to submit your application. Your information is secure and confidential.

hero.title: Join the Academy
hero.description: Take the first step towards sporting excellence. Our admission process is designed to be transparent, inclusive and accessible to young talents across Africa.

process.title: The Path to Excellence
process.description: Discover our transparent and simplified admission process, designed to reveal and support your unique talent.

online.title: Online application
online.description: Fill out the online form with your personal information and upload the required documents.

review.title: File review
review.description: Our admissions team reviews your application within 5 to 7 business days.

evaluation.title: Skills assessment
evaluation.description: Participate in a virtual or in-person tryout to demonstrate your football abilities.

decision.title: Admission decision
decision.description: Receive your admission decision and scholarship eligibility notification.

payment.title: Payment and registration
payment.description: Make payment and finalize your registration to secure your place.

partners.introduction: Farafina Foot Academy builds lasting partnerships with clubs, institutions, brands, and foundations committed to developing African football and youth.

hero.title: Farafina Foot Academy
hero.subtitle: Where education, discipline, and performance unite to build tomorrow's champions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.visionText: To become Africa's reference in sport-study education, producing world-class athletes who excel both on the field and in the classroom.
mission.visionDescription: We envision a future where African talent is globally recognized, where young players have access to world-class training facilities, and where education and sport work hand in hand to create well-rounded individuals ready to compete at the highest levels.
mission.missionText: Discover, train, and empower young African talents through innovation, education, and integrity.
mission.discoverText: Identify promising young talents across Africa using cutting-edge AI detection technology and traditional recruitment networks.
mission.trainText: Provide world-class coaching, modern facilities, and comprehensive academic education to develop well-rounded athletes.
mission.empowerText: Equip our students with life skills, values, and opportunities to succeed professionally and personally.

infrastructures.title: World-Class Infrastructures
infrastructures.description: Our facilities are designed to provide the best environment for athletic and academic excellence.

fifa.title: FIFA Standard Football Fields
fifa.description: Professional-grade natural and synthetic turf fields meeting international standards.

classrooms.title: Modern Classrooms
classrooms.description: State-of-the-art learning spaces equipped with digital technology and interactive tools.

medical.title: Medical Center
medical.description: Complete healthcare facility with sports medicine specialists and rehabilitation equipment.

residence.title: Student Residences
residence.description: Comfortable and secure accommodation with study spaces and recreational facilities.

performance.title: Performance Center
performance.description: Gym and advanced fitness facilities with strength and conditioning training equipment.

vip.title: Recruiter & VIP Spaces
vip.description: Professional coworking spaces and observation lounges for recruiters, agents, and partners.

leadership.title: Our Leadership Team
leadership.description: Experienced professionals dedicated to developing the next generation of African football talents.
leadership.quote: At Farafina Foot Academy, discipline shapes talent, and respect creates champions.

coach.bio: Former professional player with over 15 years of coaching experience in European academies.

academic.bio: Ph.D. in Education, specialized in sports-study programs and youth development.

technical.bio: UEFA Pro License holder with expertise in talent identification and player development.

inclusion.title: Social Inclusion
inclusion.description: At Farafina Foot Academy, we believe that talent knows no boundaries. Our commitment to social inclusion ensures that every young player, regardless of origin or gender, has access to world-class training and education.
inclusion.scholarshipsText: Merit and need-based scholarships covering tuition, accommodation, and equipment for talented players from all backgrounds.
inclusion.womenFootballText: Dedicated training programs, facilities, and support for female players, promoting gender equality in African football.
inclusion.equalAccessText: No discrimination based on ethnicity, religion, or socioeconomic status. Each player is evaluated solely on their talent and potential.
inclusion.supportText: Help us provide opportunities to talented young players

footer.tagline: The future of African football starts here.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Farafina Foot Academy. All rights reserved.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.contactDirectly: Contact us directly via one of the channels below.

hero.title: Contact and Partnerships
hero.description: Collaborate with Farafina Foot Academy and help shape the future of African football.

map.title: Visit Our Headquarters
map.description: Located in the heart of Dakar, our administrative headquarters in Fann Hock offers quick access from throughout the capital.

location.title: Located in the Fann Hock neighborhood
location.description: Quick access via Boulevard Martin Luther King

contact.subject: Subject
contact.locationText:

cookies.title: Cookie Management
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. By continuing, you accept our use of cookies.
cookies.necessaryDescription: Essential for the site to function
cookies.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how you use the site

hero.title: FFA TV — Watch the
hero.description: Discover live matches, exclusive highlights and behind-the-scenes training sessions from Farafina Foot Academy.

hero.title: Sports and
hero.subtitle: Excellence on the field and in the classroom.

cta.title: Join a Unique Program in
cta.description: Take the first step towards excellence on the field and in life. Apply to Farafina Foot Academy today.

sports.title: Excellence
sports.description: Our professional-level football training program is designed to develop complete athletes. We combine technical mastery with tactical intelligence, physical conditioning and mental resilience.

technical.title: Daily Technical and Tactical Sessions
technical.description: Intensive training focused on ball control, positioning and game intelligence

physical.title: Physical and Mental Preparation
physical.description: Strength conditioning, injury prevention and sports psychology

analysis.title: Video Analysis and Performance
analysis.description: Advanced analysis and personalized performance evaluations

competition.title: Official Competitions
competition.description: Regular participation in regional and international tournaments

academic.title: Excellence
academic.description: Education is at the heart of our mission. We offer a comprehensive program that prepares our students for success beyond football, ensuring they have the knowledge and skills needed to succeed in any field.
academic.quote: Discipline shapes talent, and respect builds champions.

classrooms.title: Modern Classrooms
classrooms.description: State-of-the-art learning environments equipped with the latest educational technologies

bilingual.title: Bilingual Education (French/English)
bilingual.description: Mastery of both languages opens doors to international opportunities

digital.title: Digital Literacy and Leadership
digital.description: Technological skills and leadership development for the modern world

personal.title: Personal Development and Ethics
personal.description: Character building and values education to develop complete individuals

byAge.title: Programs by
byAge.description: Customized development pathways designed to meet the unique needs of each age group and skill level.

fundamentals.title: Fundamentals Development
fundamentals.description: Our foundation program focuses on developing complete athletes with strong technical abilities, tactical understanding and academic excellence.

goals.tactical: Develop tactical awareness and game intelligence

elite.title: Elite Performance Pathway
elite.description: The elite pathway prepares high-potential athletes for professional careers through intensive training, competitive exposure and comprehensive academic support.
elite.competition: National leagues, international tournaments, showcase events

goals.exposure: Exposure to professional clubs and trials

postAcademy.title: Professional Development
postAcademy.description: Our post-academy program supports graduates in their transition to professional football while maintaining educational and personal development pathways.

goals.placement: Placement and contracts with professional clubs

coaching.title: Coaches & Academic
coaching.description: Our world-class team of coaches, educators and specialists is dedicated to developing complete athletes and scholars.

headCoach.qualifications: UEFA Pro License, Former Professional Player
headCoach.philosophy: Every player has unique potential. My job is to unlock it through discipline, dedication and intelligent training.

academic.qualifications: PhD in Education, Over 15 Years of Experience
academic.philosophy: Education enables our students to succeed beyond the field. We train scholars who are also exceptional athletes.

performance.qualifications: MSc Sports Science, Certified Strength Coach
performance.philosophy: Optimal performance requires scientific training, proper recovery and mental resilience. We optimize every aspect.

psychologist.qualifications: MSc Sports Psychology, Mental Performance Specialist
psychologist.philosophy: Mental strength is as important as physical ability. We develop champions who excel under pressure.

schedule.title: A Typical Day at
schedule.description: Our integrated schedule balances academic rigor with intensive sports training, ensuring holistic development for each student-athlete.

hero.title: Our Events
hero.description: Discover the moments that make our academy vibrate. Gather around football, excellence and passion.

cta.title: Don't miss our next tryout days
cta.description: Join the next generation of African football stars. Sign up now and give yourself the chance to shine on international fields.

introduction.title: A community united by passion
introduction.description: Farafina Foot Academy events bring together talents, families and football enthusiasts around unique experiences. From our tryout days to regional tournaments, every moment is an opportunity to grow, learn and push yourself. Join us to experience sporting and academic excellence.

hero.title: Wear the colors of African excellence
hero.description: Exceptional jerseys, technical tracksuits and premium accessories. A collection designed to celebrate African talent and support our young players to the highest level.

impact.label: Direct impact
impact.description: Every purchase funds Farafina training programs

cta.title: Wear the colors of African excellence
cta.description: Every purchase supports the training of young talents at Farafina Foot Academy. Be part of the adventure and share the passion for African football.

hero.title: AI & Talent Scouting
hero.subtitle: Empower coaches and players with data-driven insights
hero.description: Farafina Foot Academy integrates cutting-edge AI technology to identify, track and develop football talents across Africa with precision and fairness.

hero.title: Excellence Beyond Borders
hero.description: International support to propel our talents to success. Training, follow-up and protection for each player in their journey abroad.

cta.title: Your talent deserves support worthy of your ambitions
cta.description: Join Farafina Foot Academy and benefit from comprehensive international support to propel your career to the top. Training, follow-up and protection, we are by your side at every step.

hero.title: Apply to Farafina Foot Academy
hero.description: Take the first step to become one of the future legends of African football. Join an elite academy where world-class training meets academic excellence.

cta.title: Ready to Start? Create Your Candidate Account Now
cta.description: Join hundreds of talented young players who have taken the first step towards their professional football career. Your journey starts here.
